勨勨勨

勨字的基本解释

勨
xiàng
徭役宽缓。
勉。

勨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàng］
［《廣韻》徐兩切，上養，邪。］
(1)徭役轻缓。
(2)劝勉，勤动。

勨字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　勨； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页149第16
【唐韻】余兩切【集韻】以兩切，?音養。【說文】繇緩也。又【玉篇】勉也。又【集韻】動也。又【唐韻】徐兩切【集韻】似兩切，?音象。義同。【篇海】或作?。

勨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
勨字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Roam
xiàng
The corvee is lenient.
Reluctant.
Roam
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàng］
["Guangyun" Xu two cuts, upper raising, evil. ]
(1) Correspondence is light and slow.
(2) Persuade and be diligent.
Roam
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　勨; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 149-16
[Tang Yun] More than two cuts [Ji Yun] with two cuts, sound cultivation. [Said the text] You slowly. [Jade articles] Mian Ye. Also 【Jiyun】moving. Also [Tang Yun] Xu Liangqi [Ji Yun] is like two cuts, sound and image. The same meaning. [Pianhai] Or make?.
